overview: Once thought lost, but recently found and restored by Anthology Film Archives, artist/philosopher Manuel De Landaâ€™s Super 8 Ism Ism captures his truly inspired collage mutations of New York City subway ads during the mid-to-late 70s. Slicing and dicing the perfect faces of models into deviant ghouls, Ism Ism turns the homogenate into the ripening rot of nightmares.
title: Ism Ism
